name: Dice Fighter (GameWin221)
description:
What is the game about?

Dice Fighter is a top-down shooter type game in which you need to survive oncoming waves of zombies as long as possible.  

The catch is that your equipment (gun, ammo type and armor) changes after the 3 dice roll and it happens every 5 seconds. 

The number each dice will show after rolling is a level of item you will get (1 - Lowest/Worst level item, 6 - Highest/Best level item).

Controls:

  • W/S, A/D - Movement
  • Mouse - Aiming and shooting
